block_comment: This block implements a counter function that interfaces with wait logic. It uses a synchronous design, driven by the "clk" signal. When the "wait_cnt_en_r" signal is low, the counter "wait_cnt_r" and flag "wait_cnt_done" are reset. If the "wait_cnt_en_r" signal is high and the counter is not yet at its limit (WAIT_CNT - 1), it increments "wait_cnt_r" by 1 and keeps "wait_cnt_done" low. When the counter reaches its limit, it resets "wait_cnt_r" and sets "wait_cnt_done" to high indicating completion.
